Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue block (preferred) or fresh-frozen tissue section
Purpose: To detect Keratin 20 protein expression in tissue sections via immunostaining for diagnostic evaluation of carcinomas.
Container: Paraffin block or frozen tissue mold
Equipment: Microtome, positively charged glass slides, incubator, xylene and ethanol baths, antigen-retrieval system, humid chamber, and staining reagents (primary/secondary antibodies, substrate-chromogen, counterstain)
